resources.string: To vote, it is necessary to possess an ID. \nInput your ID in the designated field and proceed by selecting the verify button beneath it. \nFollowing successful verification, you will be directed to the voting page where you can cast your vote for your preferred candidate.
In this page, you will have to validate your id to be able to move on to the next page. If you have not registered visit the nearest polling station to register
Welcome. \nElectify is an app that enable you to choose your leader from the comfort of your home. \nNo need for long queues or boring meeting
